segments.text: I notice the boy stretching toward the cookie jar, balancing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s going to fall any second, and the woman won’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share like it’s a normal day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re sneaking cookies right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the sink, and she’s still polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman is just too tired to notice anything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to this mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t hurt himself when that stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to trust him completely, which is almost sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR
